name: InstallOverdom Installation System
short_description:
InstallOverdom is a free and native cross-platform Installation with features where are Windows Exclusive-Only now runs in any supported platform in the palm of your hands!

Git Repo can find in: http://gitorious.org/installoverdom
summary: An Free and Cross-platform native installation System
